title.en: To Want (2) - With Nouns & Different Tenses (Querer que + nombres)
title.es: To Want (2) - With Nouns & Different Tenses (Querer que + nombres)

description.en: Master 'want + noun/name + to + infinitive' structure with all subjects and tenses. The word 'that' is strictly prohibited after 'want' in English.
description.es: Domina la estructura 'want + sustantivo/nombre + to + infinitivo' con todos los sujetos y tiempos. La palabra 'that' está estrictamente prohibida después de 'want' en inglés.

prompt.es: Mi jefe quiere que la empresa crezca.

exercises.solution: My boss wants the company to grow.

tip.en: Use want + noun + to + infinitive. Never 'wants that the company...'
tip.es: Usa want + sustantivo + to + infinitivo. Nunca 'wants that the company...'

prompt.es: El alcalde quiere que la ciudad florezca.

exercises.solution: The mayor wants the city to flourish.

tip.en: Use want + noun + to + infinitive. Never 'wants that the city...'
tip.es: Usa want + sustantivo + to + infinitivo. Nunca 'wants that the city...'

prompt.es: El gato quiere que el pájaro entre en el jardín.

exercises.solution: The cat wants the bird to fly into the garden.

tip.en: Use want + noun + to + infinitive. Never 'wants that the bird...'
tip.es: Usa want + sustantivo + to + infinitivo. Nunca 'wants that the bird...'

prompt.es: La mayoría de los votantes no quieren que el gobierno suba los impuestos.

exercises.solution: Most voters don't want the government to put up taxes.

tip.en: Use want + noun + to + infinitive. Never 'don't want that the government...'
tip.es: Usa want + sustantivo + to + infinitivo. Nunca 'don't want that the government...'

prompt.es: ¿Quieres que te derrumben la casa?

exercises.solution: Do you want your house to be knocked down?

tip.en: Use want + noun + to + infinitive. Never 'want that your house...'
tip.es: Usa want + sustantivo + to + infinitivo. Nunca 'want that your house...'

prompt.es: El general quería que el enemigo cayera en su trampa.

exercises.solution: The general wanted the enemy to fall into his trap.

tip.en: Same structure in past tense: wanted + noun + to + infinitive
tip.es: Misma estructura en pasado: wanted + sustantivo + to + infinitivo

prompt.es: El director financiero no quería que los periodistas le hicieran preguntas difíciles.

exercises.solution: The C.F.O. didn't want the journalists to ask him any difficult questions.

tip.en: Same structure in past tense: didn't want + noun + to + infinitive
tip.es: Misma estructura en pasado: didn't want + sustantivo + to + infinitivo

prompt.es: Mi vecino no quería que su mujer se enterara.

exercises.solution: My neighbour didn't want his wife to find out.

tip.en: Same structure in past tense: didn't want + noun + to + infinitive
tip.es: Misma estructura en pasado: didn't want + sustantivo + to + infinitivo

prompt.es: El agente de policía no quería que hubiera ningún problema.

exercises.solution: The policeman didn't want there to be any trouble.

tip.en: Same structure in past tense: didn't want + noun + to + infinitive
tip.es: Misma estructura en pasado: didn't want + sustantivo + to + infinitivo

prompt.es: ¡Ella no querrá que venga su ex marido!

exercises.solution: She won't want her ex-husband to come!

tip.en: Same structure in future: won't want + noun + to + infinitive
tip.es: Misma estructura en futuro: won't want + sustantivo + to + infinitivo

prompt.es: El profesor quiere que los estudiantes participen más.

exercises.solution: The teacher wants the students to participate more.

tip.en: Use want + noun + to + infinitive. Never 'wants that the students...'
tip.es: Usa want + sustantivo + to + infinitivo. Nunca 'wants that the students...'

prompt.es: ¿El médico quiere que el paciente descanse?

exercises.solution: Does the doctor want the patient to rest?

tip.en: In questions: Does + subject + want + noun + to + infinitive
tip.es: En preguntas: Does + sujeto + want + sustantivo + to + infinitivo

prompt.es: La madre no quiere que sus hijos vean esa película.

exercises.solution: The mother doesn't want her children to see that film.

tip.en: Use want + noun + to + infinitive. Never 'doesn't want that her children...'
tip.es: Usa want + sustantivo + to + infinitivo. Nunca 'doesn't want that her children...'

prompt.es: ¿María quería que Pedro viniera a la fiesta?

exercises.solution: Did María want Pedro to come to the party?

tip.en: In past questions: Did + subject + want + noun + to + infinitive
tip.es: En preguntas del pasado: Did + sujeto + want + sustantivo + to + infinitivo

prompt.es: El cliente quiere que el camarero le traiga la cuenta.

exercises.solution: The customer wants the waiter to bring him the bill.

tip.en: Use want + noun + to + infinitive. Never 'wants that the waiter...'
tip.es: Usa want + sustantivo + to + infinitivo. Nunca 'wants that the waiter...'

tip.es: Misma estructura en pasado: didn't want + sustantivo + to + infinitivo

tip.en: Use want + noun + to + infinitive. Never 'wants that the team...'

tip.es: Misma estructura en pasado: didn't want + sustantivo + to + infinitivo

prompt.es: ¿El gobierno querrá que los ciudadanos paguen más impuestos?
